explains: adj. 月经的；每月的；一月一次的
wordGroup: menstrual disorder 月经失调；月经紊乱

sentences.en: The average length of a woman's menstrual cycle is 28 days.
sentences.cn: 妇女的平均月经周期是28天。

sentences.en: Menstrual cramps also may be caused by.
sentences.cn: 痛经还有可能由以下原因引起。

sentences.en: Offers relief from premenstrual syndrome and severe menstrual cramps.
sentences.cn: 可缓解经前综合症和痛经。
